title: Lost the keyboard quick switch button below the keyboard
content:
I can't find the button to quickly switch between keyboards anymore. It's simply a blank space as if I didn't have other keyboards installed. I have multiple keyboards enabled under "Manage keyboards", and have tried uninstalling/reinstalling them, as well as uninstalling GBoard updates and reinstalling them.

The two things that I've done since I can last remember seeing it:

- Installed November update
- Connected a physical keyboard via OTG adapter

I can't think of anything else "special" I've done to my device. Since I haven't heard anyone else report this, and it's somewhat uncommon to connect a USB keyboard to a phone, I'm leaning towards that if anyone wants to try and replicate.

I like GBoard for normal typing, but it's not great for stuff like working in SSH terminals or other CLI. Would love to have the switcher back if anyone has a suggestion.
